title: Signal Fault Causing Travel Delays on Circle Line

updates.text: [CCL] UPDATE: Train service has resumed. Free regular bus services have ceased.

[CCL] UPDATE: Due to a signal fault, please add additional 20 minutes travel time between #DhobyGhaut, #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar. Free regular bus services are available between #DhobyGhaut, #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar.

[CCL] UPDATE: Due to a signal fault, please add additional 15 minutes travel time between #DhobyGhaut, #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar. Free regular bus services are available between #DhobyGhaut, #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar.
[CCL] UPDATE: Due to a signal fault, please continue to add additional 10 minutes travel time between #Stadium and #PayaLebar. You may consider alternative means of transport.
